projects.title: Mechanic Workshop Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive web-based management system for automotive repair shops and mechanic workshops. Developed for Mr Nash, an automobile expert at Dzorwulu, to streamline workshop operations including customer management, vehicle tracking, service scheduling, invoicing, and business analytics.
highlights: Complete Customer & Vehicle Management System with Registration & Profiles
Job Card & Invoice Generation with PDF Export Functionality
Service & Repair Tracking with Real-time Status Updates
Business Analytics Dashboard with Revenue Trends & Performance Metrics
Receipt Storage & Management with Automated Processing
REST API Endpoints for Data Management & Search Functionality

projects.title: OTConekt
projects.description: OTConekt is a cross-platform mobile tele-rehabilitation app connecting individuals seeking occupational therapy with licensed therapists. Features include secure authentication, tailored onboarding, therapist profiles, appointment booking, in-app messaging, progress tracking. Built with React Native (Expo) and Supabase for accessibility and seamless virtual care.
highlights: Therapist Profiles with scheduling and credentials

highlights: Complete CMS with Admin Dashboard for Dynamic Page & Section Management

projects.title: Wellness Community Academy
projects.description: A comprehensive wellness platform providing health resources, courses, and eBooks with affiliate management system. Features commission tracking, payout processing, and analytics for wellness program promotion.
